message: We'd love to answer any of your questions about the program or better yet, have you apply to participate.
I just wanted to make sure that folks here were aware of PIE, an accelerator that brings together mentors from the startup scene and mentors from Google, Target, Coca-Cola, and Nike.
Love to participate... You have to be in PDX tho right?
@robbschiller You GET to come hang with us in PDX for 3-6 months, yes ;)
@robbschiller You GET to come hang with us in PDX for 3-6 months, yes ;)
elbow to keyboard maneuver... I had deleted them before, deleted them again, hopefully they will stay gone this time.
